"Vienne": "You'll do this for me? Thanks again, as always."
"The place I'd like you to visit this time is Rayjord Gorge."
"One of my favourite waterfalls is in that area. I started wanting to go meditate there again."
"However, Rayjord Gorge is an extremely dangerous place. If you're not up to it, that's fine by me."

"今、詳しい位置の座標を送る。
そこへ向かってみてくれ。"
